comments.body: Have you tried asking upstream if they'd be prepared to start adding tags now and again?

It's being discussed, but I'm not sure how long it may take -- it's not very common very in this community. A similar discussion on [openorb](https://github.com/conda-forge/openorb-feedstock/) has taken ~2 years.
Have you tried asking upstream if they'd be prepared to start adding tags now and again?

It's being discussed, but I'm not sure how long it may take -- it's not very common very in this community. A similar discussion on [openorb](https://github.com/conda-forge/openorb-feedstock/) has taken ~2 years.
